duties_responsibilities.duty: Be accountable for the operation of the school, ensuring that the school is operating in accordance with company and state licensing standards.
Ensure an educational, caring, and safe environment for the children and parents.
Spark imagination, build self-esteem, and help children discover new things each day.
Promote the positive image of the company and play a major role in making the company a provider of choice in educational programs for the communities that we service.
Recruit, select and retain quality staff.
Help achieve profitability for the company.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Must meet state requirements for education and additional center/school requirements may apply.
